## Set seed and generate random data matrix
```{r}
set.seed(624)
mat <- matrix(rnbinom(n = 420, 1, 0.01), nrow = 5, ncol = 10)

```

## Apply column and row names
```{r}
colnames(mat) <- c(paste0("cond", 1:5),
                      paste0("ctrl", 1:5))
rownames(mat) <- c(paste0("gene", 1:5))

```

## Compute fold change
```{r}
mean_cond <- rowMeans(mat[, 1:5])
mean_ctrl <- rowMeans(mat[, 6:10])
fold_change <- mean_cond/mean_ctrl

fc_df <- data.frame(Gene = rownames(mat),
                    Fold_change = fold_change)

```
